note: Other examples that show a correlation between agreement and interpretation would need to be reanalyzed in this way.
title: Case

32 It is important not to confuse correlation and causation on this point. In cases like Tsez LDA there is indeed a correlation between topicality and agreement, but under the account presented above, it is (primary) topichood that makes an NP accessible for agreement (via movement), hence interpretation (a reflection of syntax) causes agreement or non-agreement, and not the other way around
